io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.exceptions

Class HalApiClientException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.exceptions.HalApiClientException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    @ProviderType
public class HalApiClientException
extends RuntimeException
    Thrown whenever the HalApiClient implementation fails to load a HAL resource, and provides access to the status code and URL of the failed HTTP request.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HalApiClientException(HalResponse errorResponse, String requestUrl, Throwable cause)
      Deprecated. 
      use HalApiClientException(HalResponse, Throwable) instead, and make sure that HalResponse.withUri(String) was called
      HalApiClientException(HalResponse errorResponse, Throwable cause)
      Constructor to use if the request failed with a non-successful HTTP status code
      HalApiClientException(String message, HalApiClientException cause)
      Constructor used to re-throw a HalApiClientException and add additional context information
      HalApiClientException(String message, Integer statusCode, String requestUrl, Throwable cause)
      Constructor to use if no response body was received from the upstream service.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HalApiClientException

        @Deprecated
public HalApiClientException(HalResponse errorResponse,
                                         String requestUrl,
                                         Throwable cause)
        Deprecated. use HalApiClientException(HalResponse, Throwable) instead, and make sure that HalResponse.withUri(String) was called
        Kept for backward compatibility
        Parameters:
        errorResponse - the error response as received from the upstream service
        requestUrl - the URI of the request that failed
        cause - the root cause for the failed HTTP request

      • HalApiClientException

        public HalApiClientException(HalResponse errorResponse,
                             Throwable cause)
        Constructor to use if the request failed with a non-successful HTTP status code
        Parameters:
        errorResponse - the error response as received from the upstream service
        cause - the root cause for the failed HTTP request

      • HalApiClientException

        public HalApiClientException(String message,
                             Integer statusCode,
                             String requestUrl,
                             Throwable cause)
        Constructor to use if no response body was received from the upstream service.
        Parameters:
        message - additional information on where and why the exception happened
        statusCode - the status code received from the upstream server (or null if the request failed without receiving a status code)
        requestUrl - the URI of the request that failed
        cause - the root cause for the failed HTTP request

      • HalApiClientException

        public HalApiClientException(String message,
                             HalApiClientException cause)
        Constructor used to re-throw a HalApiClientException and add additional context information
        Parameters:
        message - additional information on where and why the exception happened
        cause - the exception that was caught and re-thrown

    • Method Detail

      • getErrorResponse

        public HalResponse getErrorResponse()
        Returns:
        a HalResponse object that contains additional information in the body only if the upstream service's response contained a Vnd+Error body

      • getStatusCode

        public Integer getStatusCode()
        Returns:
        the HTTP status code from the upstream request (or null if the request failed without receiving a status code)

      • getRequestUrl

        public String getRequestUrl()
        Returns:
        the URI of the request that failed
